short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the annoying share from youtube videos inside blogs and the video is ready to play once the page loads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the annoying share from youtube videos inside blogs and the video is ready to play once the page loads. It also removes Facebook Like Popups which are forcing you to wait x seconds before you can do anything on the page
